decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - This consent is valid for a period of two years and does not authorise any works carried out beyond that period.
Reason: In accordance with the Town and Country Planning (Tree Preservation) (England) Regulations 2012.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: TPO217/2001. T1 Rowan (x1) - (T27, No.39). Reduce height by up to 1m. Reason: To reveal light and to maintain the tree at a smaller size. T2 Himalayan Birch (x1) - (T26, No.37). Reduce crown back to previous points of reduction. (1.5-2m off height and width).  T3 Rowan (x1) - Fell. T4 Himalayan Birch (x1) - (T24, No.34). Reduce crown back to previous points of reduction (2m off height and 1.5m off width).  T5 Rowan (x1) - (T23, No.32). Fell. T6 Himalayan Birch (x1) - (T22, No.31). Reduce crown back to previous points of reduction. (2m off height, 1.5m off width). T8 Rowan (x1) - (T20, No.27). Reduce crown by up to 1m.  T12 Alder (x1) - (T15, No.22). Reduce crown back to previous points of reduction. (2-3m off height, 1-2m off width).  T13 Himalayan Birch (x1) - (T14, No.20). Reduce crown back to previous points of reduction. (2.5m off height, 1.5m off width).  T14 Himalyan Birch (x1) - (T13, No.18). Reduce crown back to previous points of reduction (2.5m off height & 1.5m off width). T15 Himalyan Birch (x1) - (T12, No.17). Reduce crown by 1m all around. T18 Rowan (x1) - (T9, No.14). Reduce crown by 50cm all around. T19 Rowan (x1) - (T8, No.12). Reduce crown by 1.5m all around. T20 Rowan (x1) - (T7, No.10). Reduce crown by 1m all around. T21 Purple Leaf Plum (x1) - Reduce crown by 1-1.5m all around. T22 Himalayan Birch (x1) - (T5, No.7). (Used to be a Field Maple). Reduce crown by 0.5m all around.  T23 Rowan (x1) - (T4, No.6). Reduce crown back to previous points of reduction. (2m off height, 1cm off width). T24 Himalayan Birch (x1) - (T3, No.4). Reduce crown back to previous points of reduction. (1.5m off height, 1m off width). (T2, No.2). T25 Alder (x1) - (T2, No.2). Reduce crown back to previous points of reduction. (2m off height, 2m off width).. crown by 1.5m all around. T20 Rowan (x1) - (T7, No.10). Reduce crown by 1m all around. T21 Purple Leaf Plum (x1) - Reduce crown by 1-1.5m all around.
